properties.displayName: _CSGP: Svc Account Enabled/Disabled by another Svc Account
properties.description:
This rule detects svc account enable/disable events being performed by another svc account. This may suggest a compromised service account gaining persistence on old disabled service accounts.

Handling Guidance: Validate the activity with the owner of the service account and if confirmed as malicious, mark the account as compromised.

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: The svc account, {{AccountChanged}} was set to status: {{ActionType}} by {{InitiatedBy}}
